parameters.content: ## exclude each contact that has no transcript
## this node will group all datas of a contact (customer)
## preprocess all data and aggregate them all

values.content: =Summarize the user input. Minimum 7 lines and maximum 10 lines. The name of the company agent and the customer are given in the input, by examining the text you can figure out which one is the customer. Keep in mind that sometimes the customer name can be a number rather than a specific name, do not confuse it with the name of the company agent.

parameters.content: ## i did not want to mess up so pleas add a node to store new lead here or store it in db
